B C E G I M R S U V 

S

Services - Class in model
The class Services which has methods to get data for a particular ticker, check the nearest date in case of holidays and get a value for a company.
startStockMarketSimulator() - Method in interface controller.IStockMarketController
Method to start stock market simulator.
startStockMarketSimulator() - Method in class controller.StockMarketControllerImpl
Method to start stock market simulator.
StockMarketControllerImpl - Class in controller
The class StockMarketController which has the overridden method startStockMarketSimulator to start the simulation.
StockMarketControllerImpl(IStockMarketModel, IStockMarketView) - Constructor for class controller.StockMarketControllerImpl
Constructor which initializes stock market model and view objects.
StockMarketModelImpl - Class in model
The class StockMarketModelImpl which implements the interface IStockMarketModel.
StockMarketModelImpl() - Constructor for class model.StockMarketModelImpl
Constructor which initializes a new user.
StockMarketViewImpl - Class in view
The class StockMarketView which has methods to get the input from the user.
StockMarketViewImpl(Readable, Appendable) - Constructor for class view.StockMarketViewImpl
Constructor which initializes the readable and appendable objects.
